channel.title: Which is less detectable?

item.title: Which is less detectable?
item.dc:creator: @bumfluff120 bumfluff120
item.description:
@bumfluff120 wrote:

Hey I was just wondering, for my scripts, which of these is less detectable:

procedure BFmouse(mousex,mousey:integer); var randx, randy,x,y:integer; begin getmousepos(x,y); MoveMouseSmoothEx(x+random(50),y+random(50),10,10,15,5,0); MoveMouseSmoothEx(mousex+random(200),mousey+random(200),10,10,10,5,0); MoveMouseSmoothEx(mousex,mousey,10,10,10,5,0); end;

procedure BFmouse(mousex,mousey:integer); var randx, randy,x,y:integer; begin MoveMouseSmoothEx(mousex,mousey,10,10,10,5,0); end;

Read full topic
